properties.body:
MARITIME SAFETY INFORMATION DIVISION.
1. AT PRESS TIME OF U.S. NOTICE TO MARINERS (NTM) ISSUE 7/11,
   THE LIGHT LIST PUBLICATION CORRECTIONS PUBLISHED IN
   U.S. COAST GUARD DISTRICT LOCAL NOTICE TO MARINERS (LNM)
   ISSUES 4/11 COULD NOT BE INCLUDED DUE TO TECHNICAL
   DIFFICULTIES. THE SAME DIFFICULTIES ARE PREVENTING
   THE MARITIME SAFETY UNCLASSIFIED WEBSITE FROM BEING
   UPDATED WITH THE PDF FILES AND DATABASE UPDATES
   ASSOCIATED WITH NTM ISSUE 7/11.
2. AS A CONTINGENCY, USERS CAN DOWNLOAD AN ABRIDGED VERSION OF
   THE NTM 7/11 PDF FILE FROM THE DIGITAL NAUTICAL CHART (DNC)
   SIPRNET WEBSITE AT http:www.nga.smil.mil/products/dnc1/unm
